00055 /*
00056         | PREAMBLE | PREAMBLE | CHECKSUM | CMD | LENGTH | DATA[0] | DATA[1] | .. | POSTAMBLE |
00057 */

00063 #define UC_MESSAGE_IN_BUFFER    1

00066 #define UC_SIZE_FIXED   5
00067 
00069 #define UC_COMM_MSG_PREAMBLE            0xFE
00070 
00071 #define UC_COMM_MSG_POSTAMBLE           0xFD
00072 
00073 #define UC_COMM_MSG_ACK                                 0xFB
00074 
00075 #define UC_COMM_MSG_NACK                                0xFA

00079

00082

00088

00094 typedef struct {
00096         unsigned char checksum;
00098         unsigned char cmd;
00100         unsigned char length;
00102         unsigned char data[UC_MESSAGE_DATA_SIZE];
00103 } UC_MESSAGE;
